summary: A martial arts movie star must fake his death to find the people who are trying to kill him.
cast: Bruce Lee|Gig Young|Dean Jagger|Hugh O'Brian|Colleen Camp|Robert Wall|Mel Novak|Kareem Abdul-Jabbar|Chuck Norris|Dan Inosanto|Billy McGill|Sammo Kam-Bo Hung|Roy Chiao|Tony Chiu-Wai Leung|Jim James|Russell Cawthorne|David Hu|Peter Gee|Don Barry|Jess Hardie|Eddie Lye|Peter Nelson|Tae-jeong Kim|Yuan Chieh|Han Jae Ji|James Tien|Casanova Wong|Bolo Yeung|Biao Yuen|Robert Baker|Stephen Chang|Robert Clouse|Warwick Paul Evans|Christopher Kent|Robert Kerver|Taky Kimura|John Ladalski|Ching-Ying Lam|Kun Li|Chia-Yung Liu|Mars|Nora Miao|Andre Morgan|Kim Schmidt|Betty Ting Pei|Ing-Sik Whang|Maria Yi|Wah Yuen
title: Juego con la muerte
